scripts.test: cd test && ../node_modules/.bin/elm-package install --yes && ../node_modules/.bin/elm-make TestDropdown.elm --yes --output ../build/TestDropdown.js && ../node_modules/.bin/karma start karma.conf.js --single-run
scripts.travis-test: cd test && ../node_modules/.bin/elm-package install --yes && ../node_modules/.bin/elm-make TestDropdown.elm --yes --output ../build/TestDropdown.js && ../node_modules/.bin/karma start karma.conf.js --single-run --no-colors
